methods.name: bigquery
title: Google
Cloud#bigquery
methods.description:
Creates a new object for connecting to the BigQuery service. Each call creates a new connection.

For more information on connecting to Google Cloud see the Authentication Guide.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery
dataset = bigquery.dataset "my_dataset"
table = dataset.table "my_table"
table.data.each do |row|
  puts row
end

examples.caption: The default scope can be overridden with the scope option:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud  = Google::Cloud.new
platform_scope = "https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-platform"
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery scope: platform_scope

params.name: scope
params.description:
The OAuth 2.0 scopes controlling the set of resources and operations that the connection can access. See Using OAuth 2.0 to Access Google APIs.

The default scope is:

  • https://www.googleapis.com/auth/bigquery

params.name: retries
params.description: Number of times to retry requests on server error. The default value is 3. Optional.

params.name: timeout
params.description: Default request timeout in seconds. Optional.

methods.name: bigquery
title: Google
Cloud.bigquery
methods.description:
Creates a new Project instance connected to the BigQuery service. Each call creates a new connection.

For more information on connecting to Google Cloud see the Authentication Guide.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

bigquery = Google::Cloud.bigquery
dataset = bigquery.dataset "my_dataset"
table = dataset.table "my_table"

params.name: project
params.description:
Identifier for a BigQuery project. If not present,
the default project for the credentials is used.

params.name: keyfile
params.description:
Keyfile downloaded from Google Cloud. If
file path the file must be readable.

params.name: scope
params.description:
The OAuth 2.0 scopes controlling the set of resources and operations that the connection can access. See Using OAuth 2.0 to Access Google APIs.

The default scope is:

  • https://www.googleapis.com/auth/bigquery

params.name: retries
params.description: Number of times to retry requests on server error. The default value is 3. Optional.

params.name: timeout
params.description: Default timeout to use in requests. Optional.
